blocks.name: tgbtwntriv2
blocks.content: Betweenness always holds for the second endpoint. Theorem 3.1 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgbtwntriv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cds, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(citv, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c3, w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c0)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0))))
  eleqtrrd(c0, co(c1, c2, c0), co(c1, c2, cv(hs0)), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)))))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)))
  oveq2d(c1, c2, c0, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)))))
  adantrl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))
  axtgcgrid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c4, c5, c2, c0, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(c4, cstrkg))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(c0, c3))
  simpr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3)), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(hs0)), co(c0, c5, c0)))
  axtgsegcon(hs0, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, c0, c0, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

thm tgbtwntriv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[c2]c0))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(dist ` c4)
  ⊣ c2 =(Itv ` c4)

  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c3, w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c0), (c0 ∈(c1[c2]hs0)∧(c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0)))
  eleqtrrd(c0, (c1[c2]c0), (c1[c2]hs0), ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0 ∈(c1[c2]hs0)∧(c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0))))
  simprl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), c0 ∈(c1[c2]hs0), (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0))
  oveq2d(c1, c2, c0, hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0 ∈(c1[c2]hs0)∧(c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0))))
  adantrl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), c0 ∈(c1[c2]hs0), (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0), c0 = hs0)
  axtgcgrid(c0, hs0, c3, c4, c5, c2, c0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3)∧(c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0)))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0), c4 ∈ TarskiG)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c3, (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0), c0 ∈ c3)
  simpr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c3), (c0[c5]hs0)=(c0[c5]c0))
  axtgsegcon(hs0, c3, c0, c1, c2, c5, c0, c0, c4, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: tgbtwncom
blocks.content: Betweenness commutes. Theorem 3.2 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgbtwncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)))
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c4, w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3))))
  eqeltrd(c0, co(c1, c2, c3), cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)))))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, cv(hs0), c4, c5, c6, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3))), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3))), wcel(c0, c4))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3))))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)))
  axtgpasch(hs0, c4, c0, c2, c0, c1, c3, c5, c6, c1, w0)
  tgbtwntriv2(c1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

thm tgbtwncom(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(dist ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(Itv ` c5)

  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1))
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c4, w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), (hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)))
  eqeltrd(c0, (c1[c2]c3), hs0, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)∧(hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, hs0, c4, c5, c6, c2, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4)∧(hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))))
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)), c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ad2antrr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)), c0 ∈ c4)
  simplr(w0, hs0 ∈ c4, (hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)))
  simprl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0), hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  simprr((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈ c4), hs0 ∈(c0[c2]c0), hs0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  axtgpasch(hs0, c4, c0, c2, c0, c1, c3, c5, c6, c1, w0)
  tgbtwntriv2(c1, c0, c2, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)

blocks.name: tgbtwncomb
blocks.content: Betweenness commutes, biconditional version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgbtwncomb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cds, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(citv, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c1, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wcel(c3, c4))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, wa(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c5, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c0, c4))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c4))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, co(c3, c2, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tgbtwncomb(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)↔ c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1)))
  ⊣ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ⊣ c6 =(dist ` c5)
  ⊣ c2 =(Itv ` c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3)))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c1 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3), c3 ∈ c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈(c1[c2]c3))
  tgbtwncom(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1)))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1), c5 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1), c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1), c0 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1), c1 ∈ c4)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈(c3[c2]c1))
}

blocks.name: tgbtwnne
blocks.content: Betweenness and inequality. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgbtwnne(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wne(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, co(c0, c5, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c6, c0))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wne(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  neqned(c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.65da(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c6, c0))
  eqcomd(c6, c0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c6, c2))
  eleqtrrd(c6, co(c0, c5, c0), co(c0, c5, c1), wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c6, co(c0, c5, c1)))
  oveq2d(c0, c5, c0, c1, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  neneqd(c6, c0, wa(w0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wne(c6, c0))
}

thm tgbtwnne(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ≠ c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ≠ c0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → c0 ≠ c1), (w0 → c1 ∈ c2))
  neqned(c0, c1, w0)
  pm2.65da(w0, c0 = c1, c6 = c0)
  eqcomd(c6, c0, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, c6, c2, c3, c4, c5, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c6 ∈ c2)
  eleqtrrd(c6, (c0[c5]c0), (c0[c5]c1), (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c6 ∈(c0[c5]c1))
  oveq2d(c0, c5, c0, c1, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  simpr(w0, c0 = c1)
  neneqd(c6, c0, (w0 ∧ c0 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c0 = c1, c6 ≠ c0)
}

blocks.name: tgbtwntriv1
blocks.content: Betweenness always holds for the first endpoint. Theorem 3.3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Mar-2019.)

blocks.name: tgbtwnswapid
blocks.content: If you can swap the first two arguments of a betweenness statement, then those arguments are identical. Theorem 3.4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 30. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 16-Mar-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm tgbtwnswapid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cds, c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(citv, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, c5, c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c0, c5, c6)))
} = {
  r19.29a(hs0, c2, w0, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1))))
  eqtr4d(c0, c1, cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1)))))
  axtgbtwnid(c0, cv(hs0), c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1))), wcel(c0, c2))
  simprl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1)))
  axtgbtwnid(c1, cv(hs0), c2, c3, c4, c5, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1)))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1))), wcel(c3, cstrkg))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1))), wcel(c1, c2))
  simplr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1))))
  simprr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, c5, c1)))
  axtgpasch(hs0, c2, c0, c5, c0, c1, c1, c3, c4, c6, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
}

thm tgbtwnswapid(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(dist ` c3)
  ⊣ c5 =(Itv ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ TarskiG)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c6 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[c5]c6))
